title: Can't dodge on the new client?
body:
Playing in blind pick and I someone asked if they could support instead of me. At the last second they locked in Garen and went top lane and forced me to play Ahri support.

I closed my client in champion select but when I opened it again it told me to reconnect to the game. It's happened before as well.

replies.body:
Welcome to League.

Don't dodge games.

> [{quoted}](name=SKT T1 Bronze,realm=OCE,application-id=PpTM71nT,discussion-id=e0vUAqNd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-06T09:01:47.957+0000)
>
> Welcome to League.
> 
> Don't dodge games.

What he said, dont dodge

You can definitely dodge games on the new client, but i noticed that if you dodge like in the last 3 seconds or so, you won't actually dodge. Just make sure you dodge like before its 5 seconds just in case if you're able too, but yeah sometimes people are butts.
